meta.title: Frequently Asked Questions
meta.description: Find quick answers to common questions about our services, pricing, features, and more.

questions.question: What services do you offer?
questions.answer: We provide comprehensive e-commerce solutions including website development, inventory management, payment integration, marketing automation, and customer support systems tailored to your business needs.

questions.question: How do I get started?
questions.answer: Getting started is simple! Sign up for a free account, choose a plan that fits your needs, and our team will guide you through the setup process. You can also schedule a demo to see our platform in action.

questions.question: Is there a free trial?
questions.answer: Yes! We offer a 14-day free trial with full access to all features. No credit card required to start. After the trial, you can choose from our flexible pricing plans.

questions.question: What payment methods do you accept?
questions.answer: We accept all major credit cards (Visa, MasterCard, American Express), PayPal, bank transfers, and in some regions, digital wallets like Apple Pay and Google Pay.

questions.question: Can I change my plan anytime?
questions.answer: Absolutely! You can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time. Changes take effect immediately, and we'll prorate the billing for the remainder of your billing cycle.

questions.question: Do you offer refunds?
questions.answer: We offer a 30-day money-back guarantee on all annual plans. Monthly plans can be cancelled anytime with no obligation. Contact our support team for refund requests.

questions.question: How secure is my data?
questions.answer: Your data security is our top priority. We use 256-bit SSL encryption, regular security audits, GDPR compliance, and store data in secure, SOC 2 certified data centers with daily backups.

questions.question: Do you comply with data protection regulations?
questions.answer: Yes, we are fully compliant with GDPR, CCPA, and other major data protection regulations. We have dedicated data protection officers and provide tools to help you comply with regulations.

questions.question: Who owns the data I upload?
questions.answer: You retain 100% ownership of all data you upload to our platform. We never sell or share your data with third parties. Our privacy policy details how we handle your information.

questions.question: Do you handle shipping?
questions.answer: We integrate with major shipping carriers (FedEx, UPS, DHL, USPS) and provide real-time shipping rates, label printing, and tracking. You can also connect with third-party logistics providers.

questions.question: How do I track my order?
questions.answer: Customers receive automated tracking emails with live updates. You can also view order status and tracking information directly from your dashboard or through our mobile app.

questions.question: What's your delivery time?
questions.answer: Delivery times vary based on location and shipping method. Standard shipping typically takes 3-7 business days, while express options are available for 1-2 day delivery in most regions.

questions.question: How can I contact support?
questions.answer: We offer 24/7 support via live chat, email (support@cresify.com), and phone (+1-800-123-4567). Priority support is available for enterprise customers.

questions.question: Do you have documentation?
questions.answer: Yes! We have comprehensive documentation, video tutorials, and step-by-step guides available in our help center. You can also join our community forum to connect with other users.

questions.question: Are there training resources?
questions.answer: We offer free weekly webinars, one-on-one onboarding sessions, and an extensive knowledge base. Enterprise customers receive dedicated training sessions with our experts.

questions.question: What integrations do you support?
questions.answer: We integrate with 100+ popular tools including Shopify, WooCommerce, QuickBooks, Mailchimp, Zapier, Salesforce, and many more. Custom API integrations are also available.

questions.question: Can I use my own domain?
questions.answer: Yes! You can connect your custom domain for free. We provide easy DNS configuration guides and SSL certificates for all domains connected to our platform.

questions.question: Is there an API available?
questions.answer: We offer a robust REST API with comprehensive documentation. All paid plans include API access, with rate limits based on your subscription tier.

cta.title: Still Have Questions?
cta.description: Can't find what you're looking for? Our support team is here to help you.
